segments.text: I notice the water spilling over the sink, creating a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip if she takes another step.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching too far, and it’s wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty now, and the kids don’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes the whole scene feel even more surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to pull the whole cabinet down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost feel bad for the woman when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
